reviewText: Within these 99 minutes, fortunately or unfortunately only  half the time is spent with Ma playing the cello ( basically the Gruber). For the non Yo-yo Ma fans, the more attractive part came from Isaac Stern/ Wong Jian, on how Stern picked out Wong when he was still a kid in China etc. For the piano fans, there is a bonus clip of Leon Fleisherand more of Emanuel AX and how he exchanged commuincation skill with Norrington in the presence of Ma. This is informative enough even if not too inspiring.
